overview:
Jawahar Malhotra has been at the core of the Web’s evolution since his work at Netscape in the mid 90s. His experience is a potent combination of Web infrastructure, on-premise Web applications, Platforms as a Service, high-scale online consumer sites, along with data and analytic platforms to measure online services. His impressive domain expertise, along with his experience leading large globally distributed teams at Yahoo!, make him a valuable addition to the Tealeaf executive team.

Jawahar was most recently at Yahoo!, where he held a variety of leadership roles. Prior to his time at Yahoo!, Jawahar was Vice President of Engineering for M7 Corp, now a part of BEA. He has also spent considerable time with Netscape, where he was one of the architects of the first server-side scripting engine.
